dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6099 IH: EVICTED Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Ogles (for himself and Mr. Tiffany) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for the expedited removal of aliens who are unlawfully present in the United States and are residents of Palestinian-administered territories within Judea and Samaria or Gaza.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Evicting Violent Islamic Criminals That Entered Deviously Act or the EVICTED Act.

section.header: Expedited removal for unlawfully present aliens who are residents of Palestinian-administered territories within Judea and Samaria or Gaza
section.text: Section 235(b)(1)(A)(iii) of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1225(b)(1)(A)(iii)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in subclause (I), by inserting or subclause (III) after subclause (II); and
by adding at the end the following:

subclause.text: An alien described in this clause is an alien who is unlawfully present in the United States and is a resident of a Palestinian-administered territory within Judea and Samaria or Gaza.
